Title: The Khanam Matra
Description:
I cannot linger in centaur lands; I must return to the gardens as soon as I am able.

The Khanam Matra has agreed to hear our plea for aid. She awaits my arrival at the top of the krutal, the central building of Maruukai.

Though I must speak with her on my own at first, you are more than welcome to join us.
ObjectivesText: Report to Khansguard Akato to join Gemisath's audience with the Khanam Matra.
RewardText:
That traitorous fool.

<Akato spits on the ground.>
